item.title: TuneCore World Cup Podcast
item.description:
TuneCore celebrates the World Cup with a selection of songs from our users. Keep your ears peeled for new podcasts featuring music from other TuneCore Artists and visit TuneCore.com to get your music on iTunes and other stores - keep all your rights and get all your money. World Cup Tracklist: 1. Ziggy Marley feat Angelique Kidjo & Stephen Marley) - "Africa Land" 2. Naweed Vs. Mario Takov Feat. Zoe - "World Bounce (WORLD Cup Anthem 2010)" 3. One Night Only - "All The Way (World Cup 2010)" 4. One Man And His Beard - "England Are Gonna Win The World Cup" 5. Robert Teicher - "We're The Socceroos"
Best, Chris @tunecoremusic

item.title: TuneCore Interview w/ Ray Manzrek and Bal
item.description:
TuneCore talks with Ray Manzarek (The Doors) and Bal, who recently came together to make the album Atonal Head. Atonal Head is an electronic fusion album with elements of jazz, the distinct keyboard playing of Ray, along with Bal's production and trumpet playing. Included is the song, Shinjuku Nights from the album.
In the interview Ray shares some stories from the days of The Doors, as well as his current work with Riders on the Storm.
Bal tells his inspirational story leaving communist Poland to a blossoming career in the States.
Both share some tips for musicians and their outlooks on the music industry.
The album Atonal Head was distributed to digital stores via TuneCore, a service that delivers music to digital stores without taking any money from sales or rights to music! - www.tunecore.com

item.title: An Interview with Izzy Stradlin from Guns N' Roses
item.description: A candid interview with Guns N' Roses co-founder Izzy Stradlin. Starting the band, getting signed, making Appetite For Destruction, taking off, getting out of control and leaving the band, what next and the Izzy's new albums.
item.itunes:author: Jeff Price

item.title: Sell Your Music, Not Your Soul:technology changes everything
